text: Isidore Mankofsky (September 22, 1931 â€“ March 11, 2021) was an American cinematographer. He was best known for his work The Muppet Movie (1979) and The Jazz Singer (1980). He died at his home in Los Angeles, California in March 2021 at the age of 89.Isidore Mankofsky, Cinematographer on 'The Muppet Movie,' Dies at 89 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American cinematographers Category:Artists from New York City
